reviewText:
We bought this video to see if we could learn anything to improve our Candle Making instructional videos. We have already produced 7 videos and will be shooting several more, so we have a good practical feel for shooting instructional videos.

It was informative, well produced, and I can say that we learned a few interesting tricks and methods that we had not thought of from this video. It was definitely worth the money and we will be reviewing it before we shoot our next video.
